segments.text: Hey , Lily ! You won't believe what happened in class today !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A man sent Miss Smith flowers , and Bryan got kicked out of class !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cool ! I wish I could have been there !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me , too . I miss you . Are you any better ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But if I have any more soup , I think I'll die .
segments.speaker: S2
